hypothesis_content.title: DeFi TVL Divergence Alpha: BTC vs. ETH vs. SOL
hypothesis_content.statement: When 7-day change in Total Value Locked (TVL) for SOL-based DeFi protocols (e.g., Marinade, Jito) significantly outperforms (+15% or more) the 7-day TVL change for ETH-based DeFi protocols (e.g., Lido, Aave) while BTC price is in a neutral consolidation range (±5% over 5 days), a long SOL/BTC position will generate alpha over the next 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: TVL growth divergence signals capital rotation and relative strength within DeFi. A neutral BTC regime reduces systemic directional risk, allowing the cross-asset TVL signal to drive relative performance. SOL's higher beta to DeFi narratives amplifies the effect.
entry_conditions: SOL DeFi TVL 7d change > ETH DeFi TVL 7d change by ≥15 percentage points
SOL/BTC pair trading above its 20-day moving average
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL/BTC fails to outperform despite TVL divergence, or underperforms during the holding period, indicating the TVL signal is lagging or not predictive of price.
